name: nom nom nom (Playdate)
description:
EAT MORE,  SCORE MORE!

Jump into the feeding frenzy! Eat all the food, drink all the drinks, but avoid the hot peppers or you'll be in for a world of pain!

Grab the power-ups to get a boost! Maybe you'll even snag a meal ticket and unleash a SMORGASBORD!

Can you keep it cool?  Reach higher and higher levels as the food flies faster, the AI gets smarter and sneakier, and the points start raining from the sky!
